titleStmt.title: Interest mistaken, or, the Holy cheat proving from the undeniable practises and positions of the Presbyterians, that the design of that party is to enslave both king and people under the masque of religion : by way of observation upon a treatise, intitutled, The interest of England in the matter of religion, &c. / by Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
